name: fetchingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an attractive way: The two girls were fetchingly dressed in red skirts and white boots. His long hair hung fetchingly round his face. See
fetching
More examplesFewer examplesDressed in a full-skirted black dress, she sang fetchingly.He smiled fetchingly. The village is fetchingly set amidst the hills.
